name: Space Stinger
description:
Space Stinger

A Retro Game Boy inspired Space Shooter.

This game was made with a lot of love during a month by James Table (Jaime Luis Mesa Víquez).

Controls:

-Directional keys: Move.

-Z: Shot.

-Kill enemies to increase the power percentage and improve your bullets

-R: Restart game.

-Esc: Quit game.
